verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ch'oxcaneli to malaj in mul, yujto anhej tas vach' ayoch d'a in pensar in k'ulani. Mamin, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, malaj in chab'k'olal d'ayach.
Mamin, ilin, b'eytzitej in pensar yed' tas tzin nib'ej.
Yujto max b'atcanlaj a vach'k'olal satk'olal vuuj, tzach in k'anab'ajejnhej.
Manh junnhejoclaj tzin ek' yed' eb' ixtum anima. Malaj b'aj junnhej tzin ek' yed' eb' chab' sat.
Tzin yajcanel smolchajelal eb' chuc chi'. Val yel malaj b'aj vach' vak'an yed' eb' tz'ixtanb'at vach' b'eyb'al.
Tzin b'iquel in k'ab' yuj in ch'oxaneli to malaj in chucal. Ichato chi' b'ian tzin ek' oyoyoc d'a spatic yichanh altar,
svalan vach' lolonel d'a b'ital, svalanel masanil tas satub'tac tza b'o'o.
Mamin Jehová, tzin xajanej a templo b'aj cajan ach eq'ui. Ata' tz'alchajel snivanil elk'ochi.
Manh iq'uel in q'uinal yed' eb' sk'ulan chucal. Manh in a satel yed' eb' milum anima,
yujto anhej chucal snib'ej eb' sk'ulej, b'ecan sk'ol eb' schaan q'uen tumin yic smontaji.
A inxo jun, tzin nib'ej tzin b'eynhej d'a in vach'ilal, yuj chi' colinel Mamin, ok'oc val a k'ool d'ayin,
yic tek'annhej vaj d'a b'eyb'al vach'. Mamin Jehová, ol val vach' lolonel d'ayach d'a scal eb' molanek' d'a ichanh.
